attributes.action: why are drug users and criminals still allowed to remain around children whom they have already neglected or abused
attributes.additional_details: I WANT TO KNOW WHAT THE GOVERNMENT IS GOING TO DO TO PROTECT THIS CHILD WHO HAS BEEN INVOLVED IN INCIDENT WHERE A PROLIFIC OFFENDOR WHOM HAS ONLY KNOWN HIM A SHORT TIME GETS ARRESTED WITH THIS YOUNG BABY WHOM HE USED AS HIS DECOY AND THIS DRUG USING OFFENDOR IS BEING MONITORED IN THE COMMUNITY AND SOCIAL SERVICES SEEM TO THINK ITS OK FOR THIS CHILD TO REMAIN AROUND THIS PERSON.THIS IS SHOCKING AND TOTALLY UNACCEPTIBLE AND WE WANDER WHY THERE ARE SO MANY TRADEGYS WITH CHILDREN
